H0.text: Which fictional girls' boarding school was created by the cartoonist Ronald Searle. Malory Towers

H1.text: Which fictional girls' boarding school was created by the cartoonist Ronald Searle. Beauxbatons Academy

H2.text: Which fictional girls' boarding school was created by the cartoonist Ronald Searle. Miss Cackle's Academy

H3.text: Which fictional girls' boarding school was created by the cartoonist Ronald Searle. St Trinian

A4.text: St Trinian's is a British gag cartoon comic strip series, created and drawn by Ronald Searle from 1946 until 1952.

A5.text: Searle published his first St Trinian's School cartoon in 1941 in the magazine Lilliput.
